hero.title: Upcoming Projects
hero.subtitle: Exciting new initiatives and programs coming soon to expand learning opportunities for our students

section.title: Coming Soon
section.subtitle: We are constantly expanding to bring you more career opportunities

projects.title: Advanced Culinary Arts Program
projects.description: A new specialized program focusing on international cuisine, food presentation, and modern culinary techniques. Students will learn from master chefs with hands-on experience in professional kitchens.

projects.title: Digital Skills & IT Training Center
projects.description: State-of-the-art computer training facility offering courses in digital literacy, web development, graphic design, and office productivity tools for the modern workplace.

projects.title: Hospitality Training Hotel
projects.description: An on-campus training hotel where students get real-world experience managing front desk operations, housekeeping, F&B service, and guest relations in a live environment.

cta.title: Want to Know More?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about our upcoming projects and how you can be a part of them.
